structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 65, effective July 15, 1996; and ch. 280, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 51, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: General obligation bonds -- Issuance -- Election -- Requirements.
